name: Goodnotes
description: Goodnotes is a digital note-taking app designed for handwritten notes and document annotation on tablets and desktops.
longDescription: Goodnotes is a versatile note-taking application that transforms tablets and desktops into digital paper, primarily for iPad, Mac, and Windows users. It allows users to create, organize, and annotate handwritten notes, PDFs, and digital documents with a stylus or keyboard. The app is popular among students, professionals, and creatives for its intuitive interface and powerful organizational tools. Goodnotes leverages AI to enhance handwriting recognition and search capabilities, making it easier to find and manage notes. Its mission is to boost productivity and creativity by offering a seamless, paper-like writing experience in a digital format. The app supports cross-device syncing, ensuring notes are accessible anywhere.
features: Handwriting recognition converts handwritten notes into searchable text for easy retrieval.
PDF annotation allows users to mark up and highlight documents with precision and flexibility.
Cross-device syncing ensures notes are accessible on iPad, Mac, and Windows devices via cloud integration.
Customizable templates provide a variety of paper styles, such as lined, grid, or planner formats, for personalized note-taking.
Audio recording syncs voice memos with handwritten notes, ideal for lectures or meetings.
Shape recognition perfects hand-drawn shapes and diagrams for professional-looking notes.
Folder organization enables users to categorize and manage notes efficiently with a hierarchical structure.
Collaboration tools allow real-time sharing and editing of notes with team members or classmates.
Digital stickers and elements enhance notes with creative visuals for engaging study materials.
Flashcard creation supports study aids with built-in review modes for efficient learning.
AI-powered search locates specific handwritten or typed notes quickly across all notebooks.

faqs.question: What devices is Goodnotes compatible with?
faqs.answer: Goodnotes is compatible with iPad, Mac, and Windows devices, with full functionality optimized for stylus use on tablets.

faqs.question: Does Goodnotes offer a free version?
faqs.answer: Goodnotes provides a free version with limited features, such as up to three notebooks, with premium features available via subscription or one-time purchase.

faqs.question: Can I search my handwritten notes in Goodnotes?
faqs.answer: Yes, Goodnotes uses AI-powered handwriting recognition to make handwritten notes searchable, allowing quick access to specific content.

faqs.question: Is Goodnotes suitable for professional use?
faqs.answer: Goodnotes is ideal for professionals, offering tools for annotating documents, organizing projects, and collaborating with teams.

faqs.question: Can I sync my notes across multiple devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Goodnotes supports cloud syncing, ensuring your notes are accessible and updated across all compatible devices.

faqs.question: Does Goodnotes support PDF imports?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can import PDFs to annotate, highlight, and add notes directly on the documents.

faqs.question: Are there templates available in Goodnotes?
faqs.answer: Goodnotes offers a variety of customizable templates, including planners, lined paper, and grid paper, to suit different needs.
